content: skills required - yo k2tog k purl **tip** - if you prefer not to have a visible spine on the ws work into the back loop of the spine increases to close them this is designed to be a quick relaxing knit it is worked top down so you can adapt it to any amount of yarn and any needle size click on ** yarn ideas 1 ** for suggestions it works well with shaded yarns i designed it originally to highlight the shading in batiko with is why it has stockinette sections the lace is to keep it light and summery and interesting to knit but without being too challenging the 2-stitch garter stich border at the top and the seed stitch border at the bottom mean that no extra finishing is required many thanks to the test knitters for their suggestions beautiful work and photos anachrotech andanteknitter anitat camilliaknits chileblanco christinacoghill darkmoon who s already started her second debsf deemaurice googoo kaaatija knittycroc jdpaulson jj1216 jlwiemelt jovician lauralu lillkitten love2read momnitsforme novaofsav who s making a new one with her handspun sandymorgan sewknitful sheknitstoo southerncomfortkc stampingjoan texgal xstmj who passed the pattern on to both her daughters 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/no-fuss-shade-loving-shawl/yarns
